title: Anyone know if LoLReplay is working?
body:
Just downloaded the latest patch (8.9.22 for 4.21) and i keep getting an error saying Cannot connect to spectator stream? Anyone know a fix?

Ive Redownloaded and reinstalled it several times to no avail. Bet you any money its a Win 8.1 thing.

The Replay im trying to replay is of today and therefore isnt an old replay and should work. All i get is black screen for about 20 seconds and then a 'bing' when the exception comes up. After that, nothing.

replies.body:
It worked for me for one game last night, but I don't think its working very well otherwise...

http://oce.op.gg does game recording as well, maybe try that out
Ever since patch 4.19 LoLReplay has been working appallingly. I suggested just not using it until they fix that piece of crap. Instead use a screen recorder or streaming program or something.
LoLReplay, among lots of other programs, aren't working with the new map. I'd recommend LoL Summoner Information (http://leaguelsi.com/) haven't had any issues with it.
